article_texts:
Communication Helpdesk
Communication Helpdesk is the service arm of the Centre for Professional Communication (CPC) that provides free consultations to students on their written assignments or oral presentations. Consultations may include one-on-one or small-group tutoring.
About CPC Helpdesk
Learning Outcome
To help students learn by supporting their development of communication skills as presenters and writers.
Scope of Helpdesk Consultation
Helpdesk consultations aim to assist students with purpose, structure, writing functions, and address specific audiences required of their assignments.
Helpdesk consultations are not for rewriting or proofreading of student papers/presentation slides.
Helpdesk consultants will not appraise comments and/or the grade on a marked paper, nor do they advocate on behalf of students.
Communication Helpdesk does not engage in clarifying questions about course content, or questions about citation format.
Location and Operating Hours
Venue
All consultations will be held online via the consultation system / Zoom / Microsoft Teams / Google Hangouts.
Operating Hours
Open on weekdays throughout the trimester, except during public holidays, examination period and trimester break.
Refer to the schedule in the booking system for available appointments.
Booking an Appointment
All consultations will be held online.
Book an appointment
Booking an appointment
All consultations are 45-minute-long, starting on the hour.
Students are limited to a maximum of two appointments per week.
Students are required to keep to the appointment time. A delay of 15 minutes or more may result in the appointment being forfeited.
Appointments are non-transferable.
Sending a proxy to attend the session on a student's behalf is NOT allowed.
Missed Appointments & Late Cancellations
Cancellations are to be done 3 hours before the scheduled appointment in the booking system.
For any last minute cancellation, please email
CPC@SingaporeTech.edu.sg
.
If you are more than 10 minutes late and have not given prior notice, your appointment will marked as missed.
After 3 missed appointments, your booking privileges will be blocked. You will need to contact the Helpdesk to have it reinstated.
